mods.abstract: The Christian Brothers College championship football team of 1923 finished the season at 11 and 0. Top Row: Brother Sylvester (coach), McDonnell, Tom Shea, Cummings, Spenser Ellis, Joe Montedonico, Hiliary Linder Second Row from Top: Speed Lynch, Jack Guine, Powers, Pelegrin, unknown, Kardell Linder Third Row: unknown, Ernie Marquette, Marion Hale, Pat Johnson, Beverly Wade, George Clawson, unknown, unknown Fourth Row: Ed Kuhn, Dick Ward, Maury Wade, Manigan, Red Schneider, Bill Clark, Chris Arnoult Bottom Row: T. Clarke, H. Buggs, unknown, unknown, Charles Walsh, unknown

For all requests, please contact the Archives at archives@cbu.edu.
